Body_Html:
The Relax Duo – Lavender & Chamomile Whipped Body Butter & Room Mist

Unwind and embrace the calm with our Relax Duo, the perfect pairing for those seeking a moment of pease after a long day. Infused with the soothing scents of lavender and chamomile, this luxurious set is designed to help you relax, de-stress, and prepare for a restful night’s sleep.

Our Lavender & Chamomile Whipped Body Butter melts effortlessly into your skin, delivering deep hydration with a calming aroma that lingers long after application. Crafted with all-natural ingredients, it nourishes and softens while easing tension, making it the perfect addition to your evening self-care ritual.

Complementing this is our Lavender & Chamomile Room Mist, a gentle, natural way to create a peaceful atmosphere in your home. A few sprays on your pillow or around your bedroom and its delicate, sleep-enhancing fragrance will fill the air, helping you drift into a state of relaxation.

Whether you're winding down after a busy day or struggling with restless nights, the Relax Duo is your go-to for serenity and deep, restorative sleep. Breathe in, let go, and relax.

✔ Natural Ingredients

✔ Paraben Free 

✔ Reusable Amber Glass Jar

Treat yourself to three of our luxurious body butters and enjoy an exclusive discount when you buy the bundle! Our Natural Whipped Body Butters area decadent blend crafted to deeply hydrate and nourish your skin. Formulated with rich, plant-based ingredients like shea butter and jojoba oil, this lightweight, non-greasy butter melts effortlessly into your skin, delivering long-lasting moisture and restoring softness. Whether you have dry, sensitive, or normal skin, our body butter promotes a healthy glow while protecting your skin from daily stress with a rich infusion of vitamins and antioxidants.

Relax - Lavender & Chamomile

Uplift - Sweet Orange & Neroli

Balance - Rose Geranium & Sandalwood

Soothe - Arnica, Peppermind & Eucalyptus

Naked - Fragrance Free

Perfect for pampering yourself or giving as a thoughtful gift, this trio offers the ultimate skincare experience for both body and mind. Embrace the hydration your skin craves, naturally!

Product_Title: Arnica, Eucalyptus and Peppermint Whipped Body Butter
Body_Html:
Introducing our Natural Whipped Body Butter, a luxurious blend crafted to deeply hydrate and nourish your skin. Infused with rich, natural ingredients. This lightweight, non-greasy formula melts effortlessly into your skin, delivering long-lasting moisture. Perfect for dry, sensitive, or even normal skin, it restores softness and promotes a healthy glow. Packed with vitamins and antioxidants, our body butter works to repair and protect your skin from daily stress.

Soothe tired muscles and ease away discomfort with our luxuriously whippe body butter. Crafted with nature’s most powerful botanicals, this rich, velvety formula melts effortlessly into the skin, delivering deep hydration while helping to calm aches and tension.

Infused with Arnica, a natural remedy cherished for its ability to reduce inflammation, support muscle recovery, and ease stiffness, this restorative blend is perfect for tired, overworked bodies. Eucalyptus essential oil brings its refreshing, cooling effect to the mix, helping to relieve muscle soreness while promoting deep, easy breathing. Meanwhile, Peppermint essential oil works as a natural analgesic, soothing discomfort with a cooling sensation that relaxes tension and promotes circulation.

Whether you’re unwinding after an intense workout, soothing everyday aches, or simply in need of some TLC, Soothe will leave your skin feeling soft, nourished, and comforted. Breathe in the refreshing, therapeutic aroma and let nature’s healing touch bring you relief.

✔ Natural Ingredients

✔ Paraben Free 

✔ Reusable Amber Glass Jar

International Nomenclature of Cosmetic Ingredients: Butyrospermum Parkii Butter (Refined Shea Butter) Mangifera Indica Seed Butter (Mango Butter) Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil (Jojoba Oil) Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera Gel) Tocopherol (Vitamin E Oil) Maranta Arundinacea Root Powder (Arrow Root Starch) Benzyl Alcohol, Salicylic Acid, Glycerin, Sorbic Acid (Geogard ECT), Arnica (Arnica Montana Flower Oil) Eucalyptus Essential Oil (Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil), Peppermint Essential Oil (Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil), (Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil)

Crafted with high-quality natural bristles, this brush is designed to stimulate lymphatic drainage, promote blood circulation, and exfoliate dead skin cells.

Ideal for daily use, it helps reduce the appearance of cellulite and boosts overall skin texture.

Experience the rejuvenating benefits of dry brushing and enhance your self-care routine with Wild Skin's premium dry brush.

Transform your living space with our Natural Room Mists, carefully crafted to refresh and uplift your home. Infused with pure essential oils, each mist delivers a burst of nature’s finest aromas, creating a clean, inviting atmosphere without the use of harsh chemicals.

✔ 100% Natural: Made with plant-based ingredients for a safer, healthier home.

✔ Chemical-Free: No parabens, synthetic fragrances, or harmful toxins—just pure, simple goodness.

✔ Versatile & Easy to Use: Perfect for any room, linen, or space needing a quick refresh.

✔ Reusable amber glass bottle

Embrace the beauty of a naturally clean and safe home with our three scents...

Our Energise room mist combines the uplifting notes of neroli, the calming essence of lavender, and the refreshing aroma of bergamot, creating a harmonious blend that promotes positivity and joy in any space.

  • Neroli: The bright, citrusy scent of neroli is known for its ability to boost mood and relieve anxiety. This delightful fragrance fills your room with a sense of freshness and happiness, helping to create a joyful atmosphere.
  • Lavender: Renowned for its calming properties, lavender adds a soothing floral note that reduces stress and encourages relaxation. It’s the perfect companion for winding down after a long day.
  • Bergamot: With its crisp, citrus aroma, bergamot invigorates the senses while also promoting a sense of calm. It’s known to help alleviate feelings of tension and enhance emotional well-being.

Our Balance all-natural room spray combines the uplifting aroma of fresh oranges with the warm, earthy notes of sandalwood and the delicate floral essence of rose.

  • Sweet Orange: The bright, zesty scent of orange invigorates your senses, promoting a cheerful and uplifting atmosphere.
  • Sandalwood: Infused with the calming aroma of sandalwood, this spray creates a grounding and peaceful environment, perfect for relaxation and meditation.
  • Rose Geranium: The subtle sweetness of rose adds a touch of romance and tranquillity, making every room feel welcoming and cosy.

Create a calming retreat in your home with our Relax Room Mist. This soothing natural room spray blends the tranquil aromas of lavender and chamomile, designed to promote relaxation and peace in any space.

  • Lavender: Known for its calming properties, lavender fills your room with a gentle, floral fragrance that helps reduce stress and anxiety, promoting a restful atmosphere.
  • Chamomile: The warm, apple-like scent of chamomile enhances relaxation, making it perfect for winding down after a long day or preparing for a restful night’s sleep.

FREE POSTAGE ON GIFT BOX ORDER

Introducing our Natural Face Cleanser for Aging Skin, a multi-functional formula that gently exfoliates, deeply cleanses, and effortlessly removes makeup while nourishing mature skin. Infused with soothing botanical extracts and natural exfoliants, this cleanser works to slough away dead skin cells and impurities, revealing a smoother, brighter complexion.

Crafted with hydrating ingredients like Aloe Vera Butter and Pumpkin Seed Oil, it provides deep moisture without over-drying, helping to maintain your skin’s natural balance. The gentle exfoliating action promotes cell renewal, while its makeup-removing properties dissolve even the most stubborn cosmetics.

Free from harsh chemicals and synthetic fragrances, this natural cleanser is perfect for aging skin, leaving it refreshed, soft, and glowing with youthful radiance. Perfect for a complete skincare routine that pampers and protects.

Introducing our Natural Face Oil for Aging Skin, a deeply nourishing blend designed to hydrate, firm, and restore a youthful glow. Infused with powerful anti-aging ingredients like Vitamin E Oil, this face oil helps protect your skin from environmental damage while promoting skin regeneration and reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

The rich emollient properties of Castor Oil provide deep hydration, while Jojoba Oil mimics the skin’s natural oils, balancing moisture levels without clogging pores. Rosehip Oil, known for its high concentration of vitamins and essential fatty acids, helps fade dark spots, reduce the appearance of scars, and improve skin elasticity.

Lightweight and easily absorbed, this natural oil blend is perfect for restoring a radiant, youthful complexion, leaving your skin feeling soft, smooth, and deeply nourished. Free from synthetic chemicals, it’s the ideal addition to your anti-aging skincare routine.

Introducing our Natural Face Oil for Aging Skin, a deeply nourishing blend designed to hydrate, firm, and restore a youthful glow. Infused with powerful anti-aging ingredients like Vitamin E Oil, this face oil helps protect your skin from environmental damage while promoting skin regeneration and reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

The rich emollient properties of Castor Oil provide deep hydration, while Jojoba Oil mimics the skin’s natural oils, balancing moisture levels without clogging pores. Rosehip Oil, known for its high concentration of vitamins and essential fatty acids, helps fade dark spots, reduce the appearance of scars, and improve skin elasticity.

Lightweight and easily absorbed, this natural oil blend is perfect for restoring a radiant, youthful complexion, leaving your skin feeling soft, smooth, and deeply nourished. Free from synthetic chemicals, it’s the ideal addition to your anti-aging skincare routine.

Introducing our Natural Face Toner for Aging Skin, a luxurious and refreshing formula designed to hydrate, firm, and rejuvenate mature skin. Infused with the delicate essence of Neroli Oil, this toner helps to improve skin elasticity and promote a youthful glow. Clary Sage works to balance the skin’s natural oils and reduce the appearance of fine lines, while soothing Rose Water calms and hydrates for a smoother, more radiant complexion.

Rich in antioxidants from Green Tea Extract, it protects against environmental damage and helps reduce the visible signs of aging. Free from harsh chemicals and alcohol, this gentle toner revitalises your skin, leaving it soft, plump, and ready to absorb the benefits of your skincare routine. Ideal for aging skin in need of natural, nourishing care.

Introducing our Natural Face Cream for Acne-Prone Skin, a rich yet lightweight moisturizer crafted to hydrate, balance, and nourish without clogging pores. Infused with Shea Butter for deep hydration and soothing properties, this cream helps calm inflammation while keeping your skin soft and smooth.

A blend of Jojoba Oil, Sea Buckthorn, and Grapeseed Oil regulates excess oil production and clears pores, reducing breakouts and supporting a clearer complexion. Rosehip Oil further enhances skin health by promoting healing and fading acne scars, leaving your skin brighter and more even-toned.

Free from harsh chemicals, this non-comedogenic formula delivers long-lasting moisture and a radiant, blemish-free glow, perfect for sensitive, acne-prone skin.

Introducing our Natural Face Cleanser for Acne-Prone Skin, a luxurious, multi-tasking formula that gently exfoliates, removes makeup, and nourishes your skin. Infused with Aloe Butter and Mango Butter, it hydrates and soothes while cleansing, leaving your skin feeling soft and supple. Jojoba Oil, Pumpkin Seed Oil, and Grape Seed Oil work together to balance oil production, clear pores, and prevent breakouts without clogging your skin.

This gentle cleanser also provides a light exfoliation to remove dead skin cells, helping to reveal a smoother, clearer complexion. Free from harsh chemicals and perfect for acne-prone skin, it effectively removes makeup and impurities, leaving your skin refreshed, hydrated, and glowing with health.

Introducing our Natural Face Oil for Acne-Prone Skin, a lightweight, non-comedogenic blend designed to nourish and balance while helping to prevent breakouts. This powerful formula features apricot kernel oil, pumpkin seed oil, and tea tree oil—all known for their ability to soothe inflammation, regulate oil production, and fade acne scars.

Ideal for sensitive skin, this face oil hydrates without clogging pores, leaving your skin feeling soft, smooth, and refreshed. Free from synthetic additives and harsh chemicals, it's the perfect addition to your natural skincare routine, offering deep hydration and a clearer, more radiant complexion.

Introducing our Natural Face Toner for Acne-Prone Skin, a gentle yet powerful solution designed to balance, purify, and soothe your skin. Crafted with a blend of natural ingredients, this toner helps reduce excess oil, unclog pores, and calm irritation without stripping your skin’s natural moisture.

Key ingredients like witch hazel, tea tree oil, and aloe vera work in harmony to target blemishes, minimise redness, and promote a clearer complexion. Free from harsh chemicals, parabens, and artificial fragrances, it’s perfect for sensitive, acne-prone skin in need of a refreshing, natural treatment.

Say goodbye to breakouts and hello to healthy, radiant skin!

Introducing our Four-Step Anti-Aging Collection, expertly designed to rejuvenate and revitalise your skin, restoring its youthful radiance. This curated collection offers a holistic approach to skincare, addressing the visible signs of aging with each meticulously crafted product.

  1. Cleansing Balm: Kick off your regimen with our indulgent cleansing balm, which effortlessly dissolves makeup and impurities while delivering deep nourishment. Infused with luxurious botanical oils, it provides a gentle cleanse that leaves your skin feeling refreshed and thoroughly hydrated.

  2. Balancing Face Toner: Next, invigorate your complexion with our balancing face toner, specifically formulated to refine pores and restore your skin’s optimal pH balance. Enriched with potent anti-aging ingredients, it hydrates while prepping your skin to absorb the full benefits of subsequent treatments, promoting a smoother, more luminous appearance.

  3. Nourishing Face Oil: Pamper your skin with our nourishing face oil, rich in essential vitamins and fatty acids that provide deep hydration and boost elasticity. This lightweight blend works to diminish the look of fine lines and wrinkles, imparting a plump, youthful glow.

  4. Revitalising Face Cream: Finally, seal in moisture with our revitalising face cream, crafted to shield your skin from environmental damage. Its sumptuous texture promotes skin renewal and enhances your natural radiance, helping to improve firmness and overall skin tone.

Unlock the secret to timeless beauty with our Four-Step Anti-Aging Collection, and watch your skin transform into a canvas of youthfulness and vitality. Ideal for those seeking to diminish signs of aging, this collection is your go-to solution for achieving a vibrant, rejuvenated complexion.

Introducing our Four-Step Repair Collection, specially formulated to rejuvenate and restore acne-prone and damaged skin. Each product in this collection works in harmony to cleanse, balance, nourish, and revitalise, offering a comprehensive solution for achieving clearer, healthier skin.

  1. Cleansing Balm: Start your routine with our gentle cleansing balm, designed to melt away makeup and impurities without stripping your skin. Enriched with soothing botanical oils, it effectively cleanses while providing essential hydration, making it perfect for sensitive, acne-prone skin.

  2. Balancing Face Toner: Follow with our balancing face toner, crafted to refine pores and restore your skin's natural pH. Infused with calming ingredients, it hydrates and preps your skin for optimal absorption of the following products, helping to control excess oil and reduce breakouts.

  3. Nourishing Face Oil: Treat your skin to our nourishing face oil, packed with vitamins and essential fatty acids that hydrate without clogging pores. This lightweight formula helps balance oil production and supports skin healing, making it ideal for combating acne and reducing the appearance of scars.

  4. Revitalising Face Cream: Complete your routine with our revitalising face cream, designed to lock in moisture and protect against environmental stressors. Its rich, nourishing texture promotes healing, soothes inflammation, and enhances your skin's natural barrier, helping to improve overall texture and tone.

Experience the transformative power of our Four-Step Repair Collection and reveal healthier, clearer skin with every step. Perfect for acne-prone and damaged skin, this collection is your ultimate solution for achieving a radiant, balanced complexion.
